Music Vids, Scanlations

[file name] ironfantattoos.pdf
[file size] 9 mb...sorry the scanner didn't have capabilities to
adjust the type of scan needed to greatly reduce file size

*4 pages which explain otokodate, komuso monks (who wore baskets) and
were part of the Tokugawa Bakufu "info-network" well into the time of
the Shinsengumi and tattoos (from the mark of criminals to art)....

~ Your Ever Loyal Retainer ~
